content.text:
# Filmfare Critics Award for Best Actress – Malayalam

| website = [http://filmfareawards.indiatimes.com/ Filmfare Awards]
| image = Jyothika Filmfare 2014.jpg
| caption = The 2024 recipient: Jyothika for Kaathal – The Core
}}
The Filmfare Critics Award for Best Actress – Malayalam is given by Filmfare as part of its annual Filmfare Awards South for Malayalam films. The award is given by the chosen jury of critics assigned.
